IF(ANDROID)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()
IF(IOS)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(http://www.music.mcgill.ca/~gary/rtmidi/release/rtmidi-2.1.0.tar.gz rtmidi-2.1.0)
##DKINSTALL(${DKWEB}/Download/Libs/rtmidi-2.1.0.tar.gz rtmidi-2.1.0) 
DKSET(RTMIDI ${3RDPARTY}/rtmidi-2.1.0)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${RTMIDI})

IF(WIN32)
	DKDEFINE(__WINDOWS_MM__)
	LIST(APPEND WIN_LIBS winmm.lib)
ENDIF()
IF(APPLE)
	DKDEFINE(__MACOSX_CORE__)
ENDIF(APPLE)
IF(LINUX)
	DKDEFINE(__LINUX_ALSA__)
ENDIF(LINUX)

WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/Debug/RtMidi.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/Release/RtMidi.lib)
APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libRtMidi.a)
APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libRtMidi.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/Debug/libRtMidi.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/Release/libRtMidi.a)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${RTMIDI}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A Win32 "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__WINDOWS_MM__" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${RTMIDI})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(rtmidi-2.1.0 Project.sln RtMidi)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(rtmidi-2.1.0 Project.sln RtMidi)

DKSETPATH(${RTMIDI}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A x64 "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__WINDOWS_MM__" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${RTMIDI})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(rtmidi-2.1.0 Project.sln RtMidi)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(rtmidi-2.1.0 Project.sln RtMidi)

DKSETPATH(${RTMIDI}/${OS})
MAC_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 ${RTMIDI})
MAC_XCODE_DEBUG(rtmidi-2.1.0 RtMidi)
MAC_XCODE_RELEASE(rtmidi-2.1.0 RtMidi)


DKSETPATH(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/Debug)
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG ${RTMIDI})
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(make RtMidi)

DKSETPATH(${RTMIDI}/${OS}/Release)
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE ${RTMIDI})
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(make RtMidi)
